PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-04742018-05-01,  ,  ,  PSPC, 
ActCanada Post Corporation Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Public Works and Government Services of LLOYD ARTHUR BRYANT of Burlington, Ontario, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Canada Post Corporation, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years.
AttachmentsAttachment
